definition: son of an official/son of nobility/your son (honorific)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
pampered son of a wealthy family

sentences.english: Don't say I didn't warn you, he is a womanizer.
sentences.chinese: 不要說我沒告訴你他是一個花花公子。

sentences.english: And then, Hu Yin comes here every evening.
sentences.chinese: 於是，胡公子每天晚上都來。

sentences.english: It tur out that you are Mr. Ford's son. No wonder you are the very image of him.
sentences.chinese: 原來你是福特先生的公子，怪不得長得那麼象他。

sentences.english: The daughter of teacher Wang has a lot of talent.
sentences.chinese: 王老師家的女公子是位才女。

sentences.english: He has been given a label "playboy" by his friends.
sentences.chinese: 他賭朋友給他丘了一滾花花公子”的綽慌。

sentences.english: Finally one day she hid the playboy in her covered flower basket.
sentences.chinese: 一天女僕終於將花花公子藏在了大花籃裏。

sentences.english: Belles and beaux philandered in the hotels.
sentences.chinese: 美貌女子和花花公子在旅館裏調情。

sentences.english: But there are advantages to Playboy's approach that extend beyond sidestepping the censors.
sentences.chinese: 但花花公子有辦法做到避開審查而擴展發佈平臺。

sentences.english: For what make people be again harmed dead by the childe after producing good will to the some role?
sentences.chinese: 爲啥總要讓人對某角色產生了好感後再被公子害死？

sentences.english: It's all so boring here, Margo - there's nothing but playboys and tennis pros.
sentences.chinese: 馬戈，這太無聊了，除了花花公子就是網球專家。

sentences.english: However, in real life he is a dandy .
sentences.chinese: 但在現實生活中，他卻是個遊戲人間的花花公子。

sentences.english: In brief tied cilia, whole body gray huge Xiu childe's clothes.
sentences.chinese: 簡單的束了頭髮，一身灰色大袖公子裳。

sentences.english: The future belongs to the dandy. It is the exquisites who are going to rule.
sentences.chinese: 未來屬於花花公子，而正是這些紈褲子弟將執掌權柄。

sentences.english: Prince Zhi has loved me madly for years.
sentences.chinese: 公子治已經苦苦的愛了我很多年。

sentences.english: Home to as many poets and painters as playboys and boulevardiers, Taormina represents the creative cross-section that has made the region famous for the last 60 years.
sentences.chinese: 陶爾米納以誕生了許多詩人畫家及花花公子而出名。

definition: son of the boss/young master of the house/your son (honorific)
crown prince/heir of a noble house
my husband and master (archaic)/playboy of rich family/pimp
eldest daughter of an affluent family/(polite) your daughter/bossy or indulged young woman/Miss High and Mighty
(dialect) form of address for one's wife/polite form of address for a woman
elder brother/term of respect for a man of about the same age
